title: Will Glacier Melt Lead to Increased Seismic Activity in Mountain Regions?
description: In a recent study, scientists determined that climate change-induced glacial melt may cause more earthquakes.
content: A recent study from Earth and Planetary Science Letters is the first to directly link earthquakes to climate change-induced glacial melt. Scientists analyzed 15 years of seismic activity in the Grand… [+6022 chars]
de: Wird das Schmelzen der Gletscher zu einer erhöhten seismischen Aktivität in Bergregionen führen? In einer aktuellen Studie stellten Wissenschaftler fest, dass die durch den Klimawandel verursachte Gletscherschmelze zu mehr Erdbeben führen könnte.
en: Will Glacier Melt Lead to Increased Seismic Activity in Mountain Regions?. In a recent study, scientists determined that climate change-induced glacial melt may cause more earthquakes.

title: Earthquake of magnitude 4.2 occurs in Bay of Bengal
description: A magnitude 4.2 earthquake struck the Bay of Bengal at 7:26 IST on December 2, 2025, according to the National Centre for Seismology (NCS). It occurred at a depth of 35 km at coordinates 20.56°N, 92.31°E.
content: An earthquake of magnitude 4.2 occurred in the Bay of Bengal at 7.26 IST on Tuesday, according to the National Centre for Seismology (NCS). The latitude of the earthquake site was recorded to be 20.5… [+1585 chars]
de: Im Golf von Bengalen ereignete sich ein Erdbeben der Stärke 4,2. Nach Angaben des National Center for Seismology (NCS) ereignete sich am 2. Dezember 2025 um 7:26 IST ein Erdbeben der Stärke 4,2 im Golf von Bengalen. Es ereignete sich in einer Tiefe von 35 km bei den Koordinaten 20,56°N, 92,31°E.
en: Earthquake of magnitude 4.2 occurs in Bay of Bengal. A magnitude 4.2 earthquake struck the Bay of Bengal at 7:26 IST on December 2, 2025, according to the National Centre for Seismology (NCS). It occurred at a depth of 35 km at coordinates 20.56°N, 92.31°E.
la: Terrae motus magnitudinis 4.2 occurs in Bay of Bengal. Magnitudo 4.2 terrae motus Sinum Bengalae percussit tempore 7:26 IST die 2 Decembris 2025, secundum National Centrum pro Seismologia (NCS). Factum est in profundo 35 km in coordinatis 20.56°N, 92.31°E.

title: From earthquakes to wildfires, Canada is woefully ill-prepared for disasters
description: Canadians faces a growing safety crisis yet they remain unprepared. The real danger is complacency.
content: A fault line in Canadas Yukon territory has stirred after more than 12,000 years of geological sleep. Researchers studying the Tintina Fault, which stretches 1,000 kilometres from northeast British C… [+5631 chars]
de: Von Erdbeben bis hin zu Waldbränden ist Kanada auf Katastrophen äußerst schlecht vorbereitet. Die Kanadier stehen vor einer wachsenden Sicherheitskrise, sind jedoch weiterhin unvorbereitet. Die wahre Gefahr ist Selbstzufriedenheit.
en: From earthquakes to wildfires, Canada is woefully ill-prepared for disasters. Canadians faces a growing safety crisis yet they remain unprepared. The real danger is complacency.
la: A terrae motibus ad incendia ignium, Canada calamitatibus lacrimabiliter paratur. Canadenses spectat ad discrimen securitatis crescentis nondum imparati manent. Periculum verum est complacentia.

title: 4.1-Magnitude Earthquake Hits Bangladesh
description: A mild earthquake of magnitude 4.1 shook Bangladesh on early Thursday, with tremors felt in the capital Dhaka and neighbouring districts.

title: Telecom Fiber-Optic Cables Measured an Earthquake in Incredible Detail
description: Fiber optics that connect the world can detect its earthquakes, too
content:
